programme.title: Deadsight
programme.desc: A pregnant police officer and a blind man fight for their lives against swarms of the living dead.

programme.title: Nobody Gets Out Alive
programme.desc: Hunter's (Brian Gallagher) life turns upside down after his daughter is killed by a drunken driver. He disappears into the woods, and no one sees him for years -- until several partying teenagers are brutally killed one by one.

programme.title: Asmodexia
programme.desc: In Barcelona, an exorcist (Luís Marco) and his teenage granddaughter (Clàudia Pons) cast out demons while trying to elude the grasp of the cultists who are stalking them.

programme.title: The Damned
programme.desc: In Colombia, a widower (Peter Facinelli) and his new fiancee (Sophia Myles) become stranded at an isolated inn, which houses an ancient evil.

programme.title: #Horror
programme.desc: Preteen girls face a night of terror when their obsession with a disturbing online game goes too far.

programme.title: Choose
programme.desc: A journalism student tracks down a serial killer with her detective father's help.
When Earth's air becomes unbreathable, a message from the future sends a man on a dangerous mission to an unknown world to save the human race.

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Disturbing visions and her sister's disappearance lead a woman (Caity Lotz) to call a cop (Casper Van Dien) and a psychic to her childhood home.

programme.title: The Pact II
programme.desc: A woman plagued by nightmares of a serial killer learns her dreams have a horrifying connection to the real world.

programme.title: Color Out of Space
programme.desc: After a meteorite lands in the front yard of their farm, Nathan Gardner and his family find themselves battling a mutant extraterrestrial organism that infects their minds and bodies, transforming their quiet rural life into a technicolor nightmare.

programme.title: I Trapped the Devil
programme.desc: Hoping for a joyful family reunion, Matt and his wife pay a surprise visit to the home of his estranged brother, Steve, to celebrate Christmas. To their shock, they soon learn that Steve has a hostage in his basement -- a man he claims is the devil.

programme.title: Mary
programme.desc: A family sailing in isolated waters discovers the ship they bought holds terrifying secrets.

programme.title: Inner Demons
programme.desc: A reality show crew descends upon the home of a teenager struggling with drug addiction and uncover instead a terrifying case of demonic possession.

programme.title: The Postcard Killings
programme.desc: A New York detective investigates the death of his daughter, who was murdered while on her honeymoon in London, the victim of an apparent serial killer.
